name: Etherlight Spindlelute
desc: A lute whose golden strings are as radiant as sunlight. It appears to be a relic from the Seelie of old.

value.text: Version Luna I Event - Clink Clank Clash
For 20s after using an Elemental Skill, the equipping character's Elemental Mastery is increased by <color=#37ffff>100/125/150/175/200</color> .

value.name: Golden Strings
value.desc:
Specialized refinement material for "Etherlight Spindlelute."
In a civilization long lost to time, some believed the fate that governs the world was woven like a song upon the stage â€” birthed from the strings of a colossal harp suspended in the heavens. Perhaps it was because they had witnessed angels pluck golden strings from the very skies above, their divine chords proclaiming the thundering indifference of fate.

desc.text:
Beyond the ruins of the ancient palace and on the edge of the wasteland stands the tranquil sacred forest of Lake Amsvartnir.
Legend has it that whoever breaks the golden branch in the forest will find the royal court of the Seelie, which is concealed from mortal eyes during the day.
A kingdom of the past, it lies forgotten by both time and space, hidden in shadow where no heavenly light can touch it.
Its owner has long departed, leaving behind nothing but a neglected courtyard and a hall stripped bare.
Yet, within the palace that should have been abandoned, a young woman's silent lament echoes across its walls.
"Once upon a time, the titan craftsman of the skies once wove the destinies of all living beings, the golden harp their instrument of fate."
"That was the divine plan of the heavens. If it were followed, the entire world would usher happiness in."
"Yet even the ignorant can dream, and in her dream, a new future revealed itself."
"She saw men raise a tower to the heavens, and from its heights, the tower's apostle waging war against the sky..."
"She saw roaring beasts, each larger than a mountain, breaking free from the bonds of the earth..."
"She saw three moons casting their light upon the sea, a sight soon eclipsed by an ancient dragon rising like a tide."
"All that vanished the moment she awoke, as if it had never happened."
"All that remained was the indescribable glance from those star-like eyes."
"Was that love? Perhaps it was just delusion woven from hope, ambition, and a longing for death."
"But that matters not now, for their story has ended, and it became Elysium's finale."
"The chirping of insects on a long-gone autumn night is the chorus of exiles, singing mankind's most ancient song as they live out their plight...
"They had lost the place of their bodies and souls, with nothing left but songs and memories of the homeland they once knew."
The last singers, the first Seelie, they played their final tune in the hall of angels.
The wolf who once broke into this place had long since departed. Only unfulfilled dreams remain, and continue to chase phantoms.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Sundered Glory of the Far-North Scions
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
It is told that in the years before the country of gold and white stone sank, the moon-worshipping ancestors were guided by the star of dawn to build a tower reaching to the heavens.
Later on, the most transgressive of wild fantasies, one to unify life and the world into one, one that even the monarch who ruled all nations on earth failed to achieve, was toppled along with the city in the wrath of the high heavens.
The homeless survivors fled to the south by the waning light of the Frostmoon, chanting in tears of a glory that belonged to them millennia ago.

materials.name: Lightless Bone
materials.desc:
A dull piece of bone taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
It is a fragment from the exoskeleton of a monster infused with the ancient power of the moon. Along with the vanished light, it has also lost the secrets once hidden within.

materials.name: Tattered Warrant
materials.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
One wonders what resolve drove its bearer to sign up.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Unyielding Delusion of the Far-North Scions
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The grand city of gold and white stone was no more. Following the moonlight's pale guidance, its exiled inhabitants wandered to a desolate foreign land.
The glory and prowess of the past had dried up like morning dew, yet the earliest delusion still flowed beneath the skin of the proud, unlike the graves now lost to time.
Like farmers breeding their crops, the Archpriestesses who served the moonlight, for generation after generation, selected the purest bloodlines closest to their progenitors, no matter the cost...

materials.name: Lightless Bone
materials.desc:

materials.name: Unyielding Delusion of the Far-North Scions
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The grand city of gold and white stone was no more. Following the moonlight's pale guidance, its exiled inhabitants wandered to a desolate foreign land.
The glory and prowess of the past had dried up like morning dew, yet the earliest delusion still flowed beneath the skin of the proud, unlike the graves now lost to time.
Like farmers breeding their crops, the Archpriestesses who served the moonlight, for generation after generation, selected the purest bloodlines closest to their progenitors, no matter the cost...

materials.name: Glowing Remains
materials.desc:
A faintly glowing piece of bone taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
It is the remains of an exoskeleton in which a vestige of the ancient power of the moon still lingers. It emanates a deep hue that still lingers long after being separated from its body, steeped as it is in the power of the moon.

materials.name: Immaculate Warrant
materials.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
One wonders if the exquisite styling might hide a price paid for its owner's promotion.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Oblation of the Far-North Scions
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
A blade as pure as moonlight is the compassion of a benevolent hand.
In the name of mercy, all beings offer hope for tomorrow. Even those looking to be made whole can feel the moonlight's pristine blessing flowing beneath their skin. Even the smallest blessings, accumulated, can guide the pious scions immersed in them closer to the coming Elysium.
All sins and wicked thoughts are cleansed by the pristine moonlight, all tears and suffering are necessary sacrifices â€” at least that is what the people who worship the moon once firmly believed.

materials.name: Glowing Remains
materials.desc:
A faintly glowing piece of bone taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
It is the remains of an exoskeleton in which a vestige of the ancient power of the moon still lingers. It emanates a deep hue that still lingers long after being separated from its body, steeped as it is in the power of the moon.

materials.name: Immaculate Warrant
materials.desc:

One wonders if the exquisite styling might hide a price paid for its owner's promotion.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Oblation of the Far-North Scions
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.

In the name of mercy, all beings offer hope for tomorrow. Even those looking to be made whole can feel the moonlight's pristine blessing flowing beneath their skin. Even the smallest blessings, accumulated, can guide the pious scions immersed in them closer to the coming Elysium.
All sins and wicked thoughts are cleansed by the pristine moonlight, all tears and suffering are necessary sacrifices â€” at least that is what the people who worship the moon once firmly believed.

materials.name: Radiant Exoskeleton
materials.desc:
A giant piece of bone that glows coldly, taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
These beasts blessed by the ancient power of the moon are able to manipulate their exoskeletons through the light that has soaked into their marrow over long years. Even though their bones float apart from their bodies, they can still command them at will like any other physical part.

materials.name: Frost-Etched Warrant
materials.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
Adorned by a frost-colored crystal â€” a symbol of glory. One wonders what deeds its bearer must have performed to prove their loyalty and worth.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Aureate Radiance of the Far-North Scions
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
With the unblessed birth of the prophesied son, a millennia-long plan ushered in a bleak twilight.
A scheme born of cunning was shattered by foolish betrayal. The youth who was supposed to be king took the maid who was supposed to serve him and stole the secret treasure that was supposed to be his, only to reject the crowns that fate had ordained for him.
In time, the king who was destined to rule Elysium went down in history as an unpardonable thief, and by the time the true new moon shone upon the land, the far north's final wish of golden grandeur had already been buried by a priestess, who had never believed in any god, in the empty grave of her king.

materials.name: Radiant Exoskeleton
materials.desc:
A giant piece of bone that glows coldly, taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
These beasts blessed by the ancient power of the moon are able to manipulate their exoskeletons through the light that has soaked into their marrow over long years. Even though their bones float apart from their bodies, they can still command them at will like any other physical part.

customize.name: Legion Morale
customize.desc: The Clink Clank Legion's morale affects Aino's efficiency and is crucial to the investigation!
